螹螹螹

螹字的基本解释

螹
chán
〔螹胡〕同“獑猢”，一种猿类动物，如“螹螹豰蛫，栖息乎其间。”

螹
jiàn
〔螹离〕古书上说的一种水里的动物。

螹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》慈染切，上琰，從。］
［《廣韻》昨鹽切，平鹽，從。］
见“螹離”。
[②]［chán］
［《集韻》鋤咸切，平咸，崇。］
见“螹2胡”。

螹字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螹； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1095第11
【唐韻】慈染切，音漸。【說文】螹?也。　又【玉篇】才廉切。義同。

螹字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
螹字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stupid
chán
〔Zing Hu] is the same as "Xiao Hu", a kind of ape animal, such as "Xiao Xing Zing, inhabits in between."
Stupid
jiàn
[Zi Li] An animal in the water mentioned in ancient books.
Stupid
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guang Yun" Ci Ran cut, Shang Yan, from. ]
["Guangyun" salt cut yesterday, flat salt, from. ]
See "Zi Li".
[②]［chán］
["Ji Yun" hoe salty cut, flat salty, Chong. ]
See "Xiao 2 Hu".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螹; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1095 Page 11
【Tang Yun】Ciran cut, the sound gradually. [Said the text] Chi? Also.　[Jade articles] It’s just cheap and cut. The same meaning.
